rows.label: tlk4537015304_msg0001
rows.name:
The mayor told me all about
the Village Guardian.

rows.label: tlk4537015304_msg0002
rows.name:
I'd like to investigate this Spirit Crucible
Elpys place as well, but I can't afford
to put myself in danger right now.

rows.label: tlk4537015304_msg0003
rows.name:
A teacher being reckless would set
a terrible example for the children.
I'll hold off until they're all grown up.
